Capturing moments

About

Epameinondas was born in Chalkida and based in Athens.He got his bachelor's degree in Life Science and in Information Technology and worked in health sector for a few years. He start to attended photography and cimatography seminars at art workshop in Chalkida and cinematographic workshop in pofpa Athens. His great weakness is shooting and appearing in films, so he bought an analog camera and started to combine traveling with photography.

About

Leno is a mobile app that helps you stay focused and improve your productivity. The app provides you with tools to set goals, track your progress, and maintain a healthy work-life balance.
